archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0801
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Direct Cost Specialist - We want the inbound and outbound CDR stitched for commercial analysis, such as quantify international inbound New Zealand termination on third parties' networks. Source EDW
